item1:
AS/RS命令数据维护
AS/RS transfer command data maintenance
item2:
取消、强制完成或变更立库命令优先顺位
Cancel, force completion, or change the priority order of the AS/RS transfer command
item4:
尚未开始执行立库出入库搬运命令的动作
The action of the AS/RS transfer command has not been started
item5:
命令信息的查询条件
Query conditions for command information
item6:
更新命令数据
Update command data
item7:
如果无符合条件的出入库搬运命令数据，系统将提示查无命令信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q070 AS/RS Transfer Command Query作业查询命令数据与状态；或挑选指定的命令号
If there is no qualified command data for inbound and outbound storage, the system will prompt for no command information. The user can execute Data Inquire-> Q070 AS / RS Transfer Command Query to query the command data and status; or select the specified command number
item8:
1. 输入查询条件后点选Query查询命令数据
Enter query conditions and select Query command data
item10:
用户可执行Data Inquire--> Q070 AS/RS Transfer Command Query作业查询命令数据确认修改数据无误，或是在重覆操作步骤1确认
The user can execute Data Inquire-> Q070 AS / RS Transfer Command Query to query the command data to confirm that the modified data is correct, or confirm in repeated operation step 1.
